hero.title: the Metaverse today
hero.content_highlight: PLAY is a tokenized portfolio that captures value generated by projects operating in the metaverse.
hero.content_text: Projects within PLAY are the leading innovators in blockchain gaming, infrastructure, and entertainment.

metaverse.description: The metaverse is a virtual space created by the convergence of virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), and blockchain.
metaverse.details_left: It will open up a new economy powered by blockchains and decentralized applications.
metaverse.details_right: It will allow for rich and immersive experiences in new virtual worlds.
